summary: Don't buy horses. Summon them and they do not disappear since they do not have a limit of being summoned.
descriptionHtml:
Now you can summon up to five different horses with the Summon Horse Spells. And once you summon them they will not disappear since they do not have a limit of being summoned. They can die though but if they do just summon another one. They do not require any magicka or skills. You can summon a Bay Horse, Black Horse, Dapple Horse, Palomino Horse and a Piebald Horse. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1008/?]here[/url]. And if you play Oblivion also look at myÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/28899?]Oblivion Summon Horse Spells[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
